name: GROW! (Diego Pontes, José Andrade, Bubbles949, mi-ky, LV)
name_original: GROW! (Diego Pontes, José Andrade, Bubbles949, mi-ky, LV)
description:
When things look broken, abandoned and dirty, you have the power in your hands to make a difference! Restore your local community garden and bring joy back to your neighborhood! 

This game was created in 48 hours for the Wholesome Games Jam 2022 following the theme Community.

Team Free Birds is comprised of: 

Diego Pontes

Miky

bubbles949

José Andrade

and LV!
